title: Round Up of Jihva For Ingredients - Dal
content:
This month's JFI (Jihva For Ingredients) food blog event took place on July 1st. Well, to those of you who arenâ€™t aware of JFI, its a revolving food blog event started by Indira of Mahanandi in May 2006, where each month, food bloggers from around the world, cook a dish based on an ingredient announced by the host of that particular month and post it to their respective blogs on the 1st of every month.



 

I am the host for this monthâ€™s JFI and the ingredient I chose was Dal (Lentils) and there were 45 participants from all over the world sending in over 50 different varieties of Dal dishes. 

I have created a slide show with an image of each entry along with a caption of the blog name, participant's name and name of the dish. (Place your cursor over the picture to view the caption)

Here's are the entries which have been numbered exactly as shown in the slide show:

1. Saffron Trail - Nanditaâ€™s Cluster Beans Paruppu Usili  
2. Saffron Trail - Nandita's Comfort Khichdi  
3. Myriad Tastes â€“ Leraâ€™s Moghalai Masala Khichdi
4. Ginger and Mango â€“ LGâ€™s Munthirikkotthu - Sweet Moong Dal Balls 
5. Pinch of This and A Dash of That â€“ Anuâ€™s Chakrapongal
6. Taste Corner - BDSNâ€™s Spinach Milagootal

Kudos to all of you for the wonderful entries with beautiful images and thank you for your participation in JFI-Dal event. I thank Indira for giving me this opportunity to host JFI and its the first time that I am hosting a food event and enjoyed it thoroughly.
